item.description:
You are invited to the Nothshore MA Pug meetup !

When: July 11th (RAIN OR SHINE)
Time: 9am-11:00am
Cost: $5 per pug ($3 additional family pug) - pay at the door (please bring exact change)
Where:
The Office Bark
950 Cummings Center
Beverly, MA 01915
978-921-1300
meetup organizer: Jodi Webster
jwebster@mitre.org

Linda & Bob Kay Sonn, owner of The Office Bark, have agreed to host our pug meets in their facility.
The space has an indoor play area and an attached outdoor play area and both are fully enclosed.
All pugs are off leash and safe.
Please bring your own chair if you would like to sit as the space is set up for dogs not people.

See you there.

group.name: The Northshore MA Pug Meetup Group

item.name: The Northshore MA Pug July Meetup
